ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Computer Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Linksys and D-Link are both good names. U.S. Robotics makes good networking equipment, as well. Unfortunately, I don t know the answer to your bandwidth
ygData.messageBody:
Linksys and D-Link are both good names. U.S. Robotics makes good networking
equipment, as well. Unfortunately, I don't know the answer to your bandwidth
question.

Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: STG2 Pierce [mailto:piercer@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 30, 2003 8:32 AM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Computer Question


Thanks for all your input guys, is there a certain brand of router that you
(as a majority) reccomend? Oh yeah I have another question..say you have 3
computers and one of the three computers is faster than the others, will
this comptuer take up more bandwidth on the DSL line casuing lag for the
other 2 computers? If so is there any way to fix this problem? Thanks in
advance for your answers and happy hunting!

Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th Season
